modules.description: This module implements an InfluxDB reporter that sends time-series metrics over TCP. It tags metrics with a virtual machine name and optionally a hostname, and batches measurements to a specified IP and port. Use it to report MirageOS VM metrics to an InfluxDB instance for monitoring performance or logging system state.

This module provides a reporter for sending time-series metrics from MirageOS VMs to an InfluxDB instance over TCP. It supports tagging metrics with a virtual machine name and optional hostname, and batches data before sending it to a specified IP and port. You can use it to monitor VM performance or log system state by reporting counters, gauges, and timings directly from MirageOS applications. For example, it can track memory usage or network activity and send the data to InfluxDB for visualization or alerting.
